post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
Hello,
Hope you are doing great!
Iam interested in reviewing your resume and having a conversation to see if we can potentially work together on the position that iam presently working on.I would appreciate if  you would send a word version of your resume and a number to reach by during the day
  
Title: Java 3D Developer
Location: Tarrytown, NY
Length: 3+ Months
Rate: Open

Job Description
Java 3D Developer, also
Seek consultants with for 1. Java 3D .  
.Seek a Java Developer with Java 3D (mid to expert level) for on a consulting base with the following qualifications:

Experience in J2EE application development is a must.
Experience in Java 3D programming is a must.
Experience of programming against SQL RDBMS (Oracle or SQL Server) is a must
Knowledge of SQL programming is a plus
Experience in Oracle ADF is a plus

Herein a brief of the first assignment; 3D Graph explorer with the following requirements:
Integrated with a J2EE Web application.
Display real 3D Charts (x-Dates, Z-$money, Y-PCT values% or ranks).
Navigation is a must including: Zoom in-out; Bird-eye navigation X, Y, Z; Rotate (arrows driven Goggle maps a like).
The ability to interactively select both point and zone in the graph and return the selected point/zone.
Assignment period: 3 Months with possibility to extend based on the candidate performance.  
Assignment beginning time: ASAP.

I look forward to hear from you!

Regards,

Riaz Uddin | Riaz@catamerica.com
CAT Technology Inc. 377, Route 17 South,Hasbrouck Heights, NJ
Office:  (201) 696 9086  Ext : 221 | Fax: (201) 727 9296
www.catamerica.com | www.cattechnologies.com
post.title: Java 3D Developer / Tarrytown, NY / 3+ Months
